content: - k32 remove repeat across all sts work in marker k2 place marker pattern until leg measures *kw2 k3* 7 times place 1½ inches less than desired marker k2 length ensuring that row 4 is the last row worked the rest of the foot is worked in stocking stitch plain k sts work row 1 twice more in except for the pattern repeat preparation for the cuff between the 2 stitch markers that is k34 work pattern repeat until next marker k2 cuff work until the foot is approx finish with a 3x1 ribbed cuff 1½ inches from back of heel starting with a purl stitch *p1 k3* repeat until cuff measures 1½ inches or desired length pattern repeat written pattern repeat chart bind off using a stretchy cast row 1 - slyf k3 off the pictured sock used row 2 - slyf k1 kw2 k1 jeny s surprising stretchy row 3 - k2 slyf k1 bind off row 4- kw2 k1 slyf k1 have a question get in touch find me as phancee on ravelry
